spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The psurlon casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 16}):

trait.name: Aberrant Mind
entries: Magic can't read the psurlon's thoughts or put the psurlon to sleep.

trait.name: Two Heads
entries: The psurlon has advantage on saving throws it makes to avoid or end the {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, or {@condition unconscious} condition on itself. While one of the psurlon's heads is asleep, its other head is awake.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The psurlon makes two Bite attacks and two Claw attacks. It can also use Pacify (if available) or Psychic Crush.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Pacify {@recharge 5}
entries: The psurlon targets one creature it can see within 120 feet of itself. The target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or fall {@condition unconscious} for 10 minutes. The condition ends if the target takes any damage or if another creature uses its action to shake the target awake.

action.name: Psychic Crush
entries: The psurlon targets one creature it can see within 120 feet of itself. The target must make a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
